name: Where Is This Going?
description:
So basically, I started working on a VN and I'm just starting to realize how much work this project may potentially be... so I want to know if people are actually interested in this before I dedicate more time to it.

The provided downloads are for an in-development prototype/demo (which took an embarrassing amount of time to make) which implements the first act of my VN. It should only take a few minutes to complete.

[ Slight epilepsy warning... and there might also be blood, depending on what you pick. ]

Most the sprites featured are just out of the sketching stage, but the backgrounds have already gone through inking... the forrest scene has to be recoloured.

Also; Mr. Robert's and Mr. Tatsuki's sprites have to be reworked, along with the audio, but otherwise the script for the included part is finalized, the rest is yet to be written.

The original idea for this story and the first drafts of this act was written by my sister, but now it's just me...

Everything else; the art, audio, programming, etc. was(/is?) done by me.

There might also be a few issues that I did not catch... but, such is development... *shrug*

Either way... I hope you check it out and let me know if you're keen...

P.S. You can monitor the project's "heartbeat" here: https://chocoblu.com/heartbeat.php
